com.google.template.soy.soytree

Interface SoyNode.LocalVarInlineNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Node, SoyNode, SoyNode.LocalVarNode, SoyNode.StandaloneNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LetContentNode, LetNode, LetValueNode
    Enclosing interface:
    SoyNode

    public static interface SoyNode.LocalVarInlineNode
extends SoyNode.LocalVarNode, SoyNode.StandaloneNode
    A node that adds a new local variable whose scope comprises the younger siblings of this node.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.template.soy.soytree.SoyNode
